data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 5,284 believers in Malakand, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Malakand, N.W.F.P., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Malakand, N.W.F.P., Pakistan. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 358 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Malakand access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Malakand.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Rajput Tonwar (Muslim traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Malakand, N.W.F.P., Pakistan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Malakand to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Jesus, 1,895,100 people live in the county of Malakand. Please, give them 379 new simple churches this year.
